result.orig: ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara é
result.html: ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara éIt's not just the weather's fault.
result.ponchtml: ní hí an aimsir aṁáin faoi deara éIt's not just the weather's fault.

result.eng: This was the last operation of its kind we will see.
result.ga: ba é seo an obráid dheireanach dá cineál a fheicfidh muid
result.orig: ba é seo an obráid dheireanach dá cineál a fheicfidh muid

result.ponchtml: ba é seo an obráid ḋeireanaċ dá cineál a ḟeicfiḋ muidThis was the last operation of its kind we will see.

result.eng: All you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ga: ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.orig: ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.html: ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobhAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ le feiceáil ar an túr aċ poll mór ina ṫaoḃAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ga: seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.orig: seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.html: seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadhA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ponchtml: seans gur fearr a ḟóireann seirḃís ṁicreaḃlagála dá ċineál don duine gnóṫaċ atá ag iarraiḋ tuairimí a noċtaḋA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.

result.eng: It's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ga: is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.orig: is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.html: is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ponchtml: is maiṫ a rinne tú an ḟírinne a inse agus ar a ẛon sin ní ḃainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.

result.eng: People will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ga: beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.orig: beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.html: beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ scéalaíoċt ar an rud a ḃeas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.

result.eng: It's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.

result.ponchtml: tá sé buille luaṫ ag do ṁacasaṁail a ḃeiṫ tógṫa le himirt ċardaíIt's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ga: ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.orig: ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige

result.eng: It's all over for you.

result.html: tá sé uilig thart agatsaIt's all over for you.
result.ponchtml: tá sé uilig ṫart agatsaIt's all over for you.

result.eng: It's a bit rough for us.

result.eng: You will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.

result.eng: It's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.

result.eng: You think it's strange for me to talk like that.

result.eng: It's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
